name: Momentum (itch) (Justin)
description:
Momentum is a small endless runner with items to unlock and stats so you can view your view your progress. It aims to be simplistic in nature and enjoyable in a bite sized package. Enjoy!

P.S. If you want to learn how to make your own games check out  https://www.youtube.com/user/Brackeys/featured?&ab_channel=Brackeys
